duties_responsibilities.duty: Repair and maintain material handling equipment and pneumatic systems throughout the building.
Install, maintain and repair automated packaging and distribution equipment.
Mentor junior technicians to grow in their roles.
Troubleshoot electrical and mechanical problems related to all Material Handling Equipment (MHE).
Maintain a positive working relationship across all Amazon Operations facilities.
Move up to 49lbs as well as stand and walk during shifts lasting up to 12 hours.

education_certification.credential: Associate's or higher degree from a vocational school or college with a focus in the Mechanical or Electrical field
